Package org.sd.text.lucene

Interface Summary
DocumentConverter Interface for converting a document from one form to another.
Searcher Interface for a searcher.
SearchStrategy Strategy interface to apply to SearchResources through a Searcher.
 

Class Summary
BaseSearcher Base searcher class.
FieldAnalyzer Field-based Lucene Analyzer integrated with the LuceneFieldId class.
IndexIterator Utility to iterate over the documents of an index.
IndexMerger Utility to merge indexes into one index.
IndexOptimizer Utility class to optimize an index.
IndexSplitter Utility to split an index into smaller chunks.
LuceneBundle Container for a lucene store and a lucene searcher over the same index.
LuceneDateUtil
LuceneFieldId Base class for identifying lucene fields.
LuceneSearcher A searcher over a lucene store.
LuceneStore A lucene database.
LuceneUtils General lucene utilities.
LuceneUtils.FieldIdSplit Container for a fieldId class name and the remaining string.
LuceneUtils.OccurSplit Container for an occur and the remaining string.
MultiSearcher A wrapper around multiple lucene searchers for query.
MultiSearcherSettingsHelper Utility to access multi-searcher settings.
RollingLuceneStore LuceneStore that 'rolls' over at a document limit.
RollingLuceneStore.StoreWrapper  
SdAnalyzer An analyzer that uses a Normalizer to build token strings.
SdQuery Query wrapper class.
SdTokenStream A token stream using a normalizer to tokenize.
SearcherFactory Factory for searcher and searcher type instances.
SearchParser Base class to handle the parsing and interpretation of human queries and converting them to lucene queries.
SearchResources Container for search resources.
TransientSearcher A searcher over a lucene store that usually keeps the store closed.
 

Enum Summary
SearcherType Enumeration of searcher types.
